channel.title: When i run client black box comes up for a split second then closes
channel.description:
I need help i went to make my own private server...Got to the point where you change the path and stuff... Well i changed them...But i accidently deleted something that said java...Now i can load any clients, I go to click on run a box shows up for like 1 second and dissapears. Black box like when you compile.
I was able to take a split second screenshot of the client when i try to load. Remember it last for like a split second it doesnt just sit like compiler.
[URL=http://img404.imageshack.us/my.php?image=rsproblemop7.png][IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/4299/rsproblemop7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img404/rsproblemop7.png/1/][IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/rsproblemop7.png/1/w800.png[/img][/URL]
When i try to compile i get this... You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. Press any key to continue . . .
Also i get this
You do not have a SERVER.class.Make sure you have used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. Press any key to continue...
Also
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
If you need any more info please ask i just need help i think i deleted javac in the enviroment variables or whatever. Please help, Sincerely Josh
Not wanting to make private server anymore just wanna be able to load clients thanks

item.title: When i run client black box comes up for a split second then closes
item.dc:creator: @santaher0 santaher0
item.description:
@santaher0 wrote:

yeah, and try it otherways with an other client, maybe you need to edit the cmd file

this can be your problem

@echo off
COLOR 09
title UR CLIENT NAME
java -Xmx1025m -cp .;Theme.jar Bot 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

than you can replace it with this

@echo off COLOR 09 title UR CLIENT NAME java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Bot 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

Like you see I have changed the Xmx from 1025 to 500, that makes it easier to run your cmd file or bat file …

Read full topic
item.source: When i run client black box comes up for a split second then closes

item.title: When i run client black box comes up for a split second then closes
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

sometimes if your computer is running slow, or low on memory, it won’t run the batch file and just close it.

Read full topic
